surface.description: Default surface background color for the terminal

surface-high.description: Elevated surface color for panels, cards, and floating elements

surface-highest.description: Highest elevation surface for dialogs, tooltips, and modals

surface-low.description: Lower surface color for recessed areas and input backgrounds

primary.description: Primary brand color for key actions, links, and highlights

primary-hover.description: Primary color hover state for interactive elements

on-primary.description: Text and icon color to use on primary background

secondary.description: Secondary accent color for less prominent actions

on-secondary.description: Text and icon color to use on secondary background

text.description: Default text color for primary content

text-secondary.description: Secondary/muted text color for less important content

text-disabled.description: Disabled text color for inactive elements

text-inverse.description: Inverse text color for use on light backgrounds

border.description: Default border color for separators and outlines

border-focus.description: Border color for focused elements (uses primary color)

error.description: Error state color for validation and alerts

on-error.description: Text and icon color to use on error background

warning.description: Warning state color for cautions and important notices

on-warning.description: Text and icon color to use on warning background

success.description: Success state color for confirmations and positive feedback

on-success.description: Text and icon color to use on success background

info.description: Info state color for informational messages

on-info.description: Text and icon color to use on info background

xs.description: Extra small spacing for tight layouts and minimal gaps

s.description: Small spacing for compact components and close relationships

m.description: Medium spacing - the base unit for most layouts

l.description: Large spacing for section separation and breathing room

xl.description: Extra large spacing for major section breaks

xxl.description: Extra extra large spacing for page-level separation

base.description: Base font family for general UI text

heading.description: Font family for headings and titles

monospace.description: Monospace font family for terminal output and code

xs.description: Extra small font size for captions and fine print

s.description: Small font size for secondary text and labels

m.description: Medium/base font size for body text

l.description: Large font size for emphasized text

xl.description: Extra large font size for subheadings

xxl.description: Extra extra large font size for section headings

xxxl.description: Extra extra extra large font size for page titles

normal.description: Normal font weight for body text

medium.description: Medium font weight for subtle emphasis

semibold.description: Semibold font weight for strong emphasis

bold.description: Bold font weight for headings and important text

tight.description: Tight line height for headings and dense layouts

normal.description: Normal line height for body text and readable content

relaxed.description: Relaxed line height for improved readability in long text

none.description: No shadow - flat surface at base level

low.description: Low elevation for subtle depth (buttons, inputs)

medium.description: Medium elevation for floating elements (cards, dropdowns)

high.description: High elevation for prominent overlays (dialogs, modals)

none.description: No border radius - sharp corners for terminals and code blocks

s.description: Small border radius for subtle rounding

m.description: Medium border radius for buttons and inputs

l.description: Large border radius for cards and panels

full.description: Full border radius for circular elements (avatars, badges)

thin.description: Thin border for subtle outlines and separators

medium.description: Medium border for emphasis and focus states

thick.description: Thick border for strong visual separation

fast.description: Fast animation for subtle interactions (hover, focus)

normal.description: Normal animation for most transitions and state changes

slow.description: Slow animation for complex transitions and reveals

standard.description: Standard easing for smooth, natural motion

decelerate.description: Deceleration easing for elements entering the view

accelerate.description: Acceleration easing for elements exiting the view
